org.jasig.cas.util
接口 HttpClient

所有已知实现类：
SimpleHttpClient
public interface HttpClient

Define the behaviour of a HTTP client.

从以下版本开始：
4.0
作者：
Jerome Leleu

方法摘要
 boolean isValidEndPoint(String url)
          Make a synchronous HTTP(S) call to ensure that the url is reachable.
 boolean isValidEndPoint(URL url)
          Make a synchronous HTTP(S) call to ensure that the url is reachable.
 boolean sendMessageToEndPoint(String url, String message, boolean async)
          Sends a message to a particular endpoint.
 

方法详细信息

sendMessageToEndPoint

boolean sendMessageToEndPoint(String url,
                              String message,
                              boolean async)
Sends a message to a particular endpoint. Option of sending it without waiting to ensure a response was returned.

This is useful when it doesn't matter about the response as you'll perform no action based on the response.

参数：
url - the url to send the message to
message - the message itself
async - true if you don't want to wait for the response, false otherwise.
返回：
boolean if the message was sent, or async was used. false if the message failed.

isValidEndPoint

boolean isValidEndPoint(String url)
Make a synchronous HTTP(S) call to ensure that the url is reachable.

参数：
url - the url to call
返回：
whether the url is valid

isValidEndPoint

boolean isValidEndPoint(URL url)
Make a synchronous HTTP(S) call to ensure that the url is reachable.

参数：
url - the url to call
返回：
whether the url is valid
